name: [2023 April Fools'] Space Soviets DEMO
description:
APRIL FOOLS!!! Hope you liked it, and special kudos if you got the reference :P

I'll keep the original text here below. See you for April Fools' 2024 hehehe

And now the wait is finally over! We're finally releasing a demo level of our most awaited project, Space Soviets!

How the release came to be?

While I did say that I would start PC Engine development for the most part, people kept peste... I mean asking me about Space Soviets, and rightfully so. But since I really wanted to work on PC Engine games, I was faced with quite the dilemma.

But I found a compromise!

The test level is going to be based on PC Engine classics! Even though it runs on the NES, I decided to pay tribute to the PC Engine with that ROM, while keeping the Space Soviets spirit intact. It's a bit of a mess, but I think you'll love it.

(I gotta run now, but I'll update the page with some screenshots later :D:D:D )

The ROM is available below. 

Programming, Graphics: Antoine Fantys - Music: Myles Davidson

(C) FG Software, 2023
